name: Street King Basketball 3d
description:
“Street King Basketball” is a challenging game for real basketball lovers. If you are good in throwing a basketball in the direction of hoop to make a basket and addictive of scoring basket points to showdown then must download this game. Street King Basketball is constituent of perfect physics of throwing basketball with great graphics & game play based on user skills.
Street King Basketball is a complete game it will surely make you addictive because of its huge amount of challenges.
Game Features:
Great graphics, great controls, great levels and highly addictive game.
Street King Basketball consist of excellent game features including 5 modes with different basketball scoring challenges and the modes are:
1 Arcade
2 Challenge
3 One Ball
4 Target
5 Time Attack
Each mode of Street King Basketball contains different basketball scoring targets and challenges.

Arcade:

Arcade mode will provide you 5 balls/chances to make maximum baskets to score maximum points.
Challenge mode:
In Challenge mode you will face the moving basket hoop with 3 players. Use your skills to accurately direct the ball toward the basket hoop to make basket points. In this mode you will face the challenge of targeted score in limited time.


One Ball:
Use your skills to earn maximum points with 1 ball/chance. If you fail to basket the ball game will be over there.
Target:
Target mode will provide you scoring target in limited time. If you succeed to achieve the target your target will get reset to continue else game over.


Time Attack:
In this mode, player has to score maximum points in 60 seconds.

How To Play:
Swipe on screen to throw the basketball in the direction of basket hoop. Skillfully swipe (consider the distance parameter between player and basket hoop) to apply force on ball to make it basket.

For Challenge Mode Carefully watch the movement of basket hoop to score the maximum points.

Play and let your friends and family play this game and challenge your friend with your highest score.
